content: the beginning of the round will be at the back of the leg you will rearrange the stitches before the heel start ribbing *k1tbl p1* work ribbing for 15/16/17 rounds or until the cuff measures the desired length knit 2 round and change to larger needles if necessary to maintain gauge attach c2 and start colorwork according to chart a1/a2/a3 work sts 1 11/1 12/1 13 for a total of 6 repeats in the round knit row 1 16 once after chart a1/a2/a3 knit 5 rnds in c1 start colorwork according to chart b work sts 1 6 for a total of 10/11/12 repeats then knit sts l1-l6 once to finish the round this will keep the colorwork unbroken over the beginning of the round repeat row 1 12 three times or until leg measures the desired length k16/18/19 in mc you can cut c2 or carry it with you this is the new beginning of the round rearrange the stitches so that the beginning of the round is at the beginning of the needle and there is an equal number of stitches on both needles heel flap the reinforced heel flap is worked back and forth over the previous 33/36/39 sts place remaining 33/36/39 sts onto holder for instep turn work and work the heel flap as follows row 1 ws sl1 p32/35/38 turn row 2 rs sl1 repeat *k1 sl1* to the last 2/1/2 sts k2/1/2 turn repeat row 1 and 2 until you have knitted 32/34/38 row ending after a rs 2 heel turn the slip-stitch pattern used on the heel flap is continued on the bottom of the heel make it extra cozy for a rainy day row 1 ws sl1 p18/19/20 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 work 6/5/4 sts in slip-stitch pattern ssk my way k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 purl to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 work slip-stitch pattern as established to 1 st before the gap ssk my way k1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all sts on each side note that on the last two row you will end with a p2tog or a ssk you now have 19/20/21 heel sts gusset resume working in the round pick up and knit 16/17/18 sts or as many as needed along the edge of the heel flap in addition pick up 1 st in the corner between the heel and the instep this is the beginning of the round attach c2 if you have cut it before the heel flap on the instep continue chart b using another needle pick up without knitting 1 st in the corner between the heel and the instep then pick up still without knitting the same number of sts along the second edge of the heel flap as on the first edge set up round knit picked-up stitches as a part of a set-up round for the gusset shaping k15/17/18 in chart b
